data: imap 25 smtp-mail.outlook.com #smtp server used in mail account. smtp-mail.outlook.com for outlook pop-mail.outlook.com #pop server used in mail account. pop-mail.outlook.com for outlook imap-mail.outlook.com #imap server used in mail account. imap-mail.outlook.com for outlook alix.amoureux@epitech.eu #email adress. firstname.name@epitech.eu for epitech mail adress. djiyrYj1 #password of the account folder #specify the folder in whitch we want to display the mails
